meanings.definition: A close male friend from one's neighborhood or hometown.
meanings.sent1: My homeboy and I have known each other since we were kids.
meanings.sent2: I bumped into my homeboy at the grocery store yesterday.
meanings.sent3: When my homeboy showed up wearing a silly hat, we all burst out laughing.
meanings.sent4: He's like a brother to me, my homeboy who always has my back.
meanings.sent5: Every time I need advice, my loyal homeboy is there to listen and help.

meanings.definition: A person who grew up in the same area as oneself.
meanings.sent1: I didn't know he was a homeboy until we started talking about our childhood memories.
meanings.sent2: Many of my childhood friends are now scattered, but my homeboy still lives nearby.
meanings.sent3: It's funny how my new colleague turned out to be a homeboy from my old neighborhood.
meanings.sent4: Even though we come from different backgrounds, we share a bond as homeboys of this town.
meanings.sent5: Growing up together, we were more than just neighbors, we were true homeboys.

meanings.definition: A member of one's social circle or group.
meanings.sent1: Every weekend, my homeboys and I hang out at the park.
meanings.sent2: I introduced my new friend to my homeboys, and they all hit it off.
meanings.sent3: At the party, my homeboy was the life of the dance floor, showing off his moves.
meanings.sent4: In times of trouble, my loyal homeboy is the first one to offer support.
meanings.sent5: My homeboy always knows how to lift my spirits with his jokes and laughter.
